name: Dyneti Technologies
headline: Reduce payment fraud

### Boost checkout conversion by 20% and reduce fraud by 95% with only one hour of integration time
##### DyScan is the market-leading credit card scanning software library that works on all credit cards.
[Get started](http://www.dyneti.com/<https:/dyneti.com/plans/>)
[ View pricing ](http://www.dyneti.com/<https:/dyneti.com/plans/>)
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DyScan_total_demo.gif)
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DS_card_element.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Block.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/TSC.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Albertsons.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/home-depot.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DoorDash-Logo-copy.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Fiserv-1.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Housecall_pro.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Grabango.png)
![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Flighthub.png)

![client](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Gametime.png)
### See how Dyneti is simplifying fraud detection and boosting conversions
#### “We migrated from a legacy card scanning solution to DyScan, and we couldn’t be happier. Our integration was quick and painless, and we had DyScan’s engineering team available to us at a moments notice. We’re still blown away by the performance of the product!”
###### Matt Banach, Engineering Manager at Gametime
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DyScan_fast.png)
### It’s fast
DyScan reduces the time required to input payment information **by over 90%**.
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DyScan_cards.png)
### It works on every card
**Scans 100%** of credit card formats, including cards with flat numbers, numbers on the back, embossed numbers, vertical cards, and everything else.
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DyScan_security.png)
### It reduces fraud
Make stolen credit card and account takeover fraud a thing of the past by verifying the physical presence of a card.
### Simple. Seamless. Secure.
1
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrate.png)
### Easy integration
Add DyScan into your default payment flow in under one hour.
2
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/DyScan_scan_card.gif)
### Scan card
With one simple motion, your customers hold their payment card up to the smartphone camera.
3
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Verification.png)
### Instant verification
DyScan instantly verifies the card is non-fraudulent and populates payment information quickly and accurately.
### Features built for you
##### DyScan is powered by state-of-the-art deep learning technology, and extracts data from any type of card with unrivalled accuracy and speed. It works in all lighting and network conditions.
### Small binary size
Compressed SDK is less than 1.0MB on iOS and Android
### PCI compliant by design
Dyneti Technologies never stores or transmits cardholder data
### Highly Customizable UI
White-label DyScan for the best customer experience
![](https://dyneti.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/footer-logos.png)

generated_description:
### Overview of Dyneti Technologies

**Company Name:** Dyneti Technologies  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Founded:** 2019 (part of Y Combinator Batch W19)  
**Website:** [dyneti.com](http://www.dyneti.com)

#### Mission
Dyneti Technologies aims to reduce payment fraud, an increasingly critical threat in today's digital economy. 

#### Team
Dyneti operates with a small but nimble team of three employees, indicative of a startup atmosphere that thrives on innovation and agility.

#### Core Product
The company offers a standout product called **DyScan**, which is a cutting-edge SDK (Software Development Kit) designed for card scanning. This solution is engineered to not only bolster security by minimizing instances of fraud but also to streamline the payment process for users. 

- **Performance:** DyScan boasts the ability to reduce checkout times by over 90% and claims to minimize fraud by 95% post-integration. 
- **Compatibility:** It supports all credit card formats, enhancing accessibility and user experience.
- **Integration:** Users can integrate this solution into their systems in under an hour, making it appealing for businesses looking to enhance their payment processes swiftly.

#### Key Features
1. **Fraud Reduction:** By verifying the physical presence of a card, Dyneti's technology helps combat card theft and account takeovers.
2. **User Experience:** A highly customizable UI allows companies to white-label the DyScan experience, ensuring a smooth checkout process tailored to their branding.
3. **Technology:** Powered by advanced deep learning algorithms, DyScan performs exceptionally well under various conditions, making it robust and reliable.

#### Market Position
Dyneti Technologies is positioned at the intersection of payments and security in the tech landscape of the San Francisco Bay Area. The startup is gaining traction among businesses in need of reliable payment solutions to enhance security and operational efficiency.

#### Social Proof
Customer testimonials speak volumes about the effectiveness of DyScan. For instance, Matt Banach, Engineering Manager at Gametime, highlighted how their transition to DyScan from legacy systems was quick and resulted in significant performance improvements.

### Conclusion
Dyneti Technologies is a small but impactful player in the payment tech space, focused on combating fraud and improving payment processes through innovative solutions like DyScan. With impressive capabilities and a compelling mission, the company is well-set to address the challenges businesses face in today’s payment landscape.
